investigatorQuestion.text: Multiple witnesses say they saw you arguing with the victim that week. What was that about?

maskAnswers.playerLine: It was a minor disagreement about project deadlines. I can provide documentation of our professional correspondence.

lowTension.text: Your silence is a choice, but it's a heavy one to carry.
Every second you spend not talking is a second the world decides your guilt for you.
You think staring makes you look innocent, but it only delays the inevitable.

highTension.text: Say something, damn it! You think this quiet act makes you untouchable?
You think your mask protects you?
I will tear that calm right off your face if I have to!

maskAnswers.playerLine: We had a misunderstanding. I said things I didn't mean. I wish I could take it back now...

lowTension.text: The tears don't change the facts.
No more crying. No more hiding. No more light.
Innocence is a fragile thing. Once it's broken, no amount of weeping can mend it.

highTension.text: Stop the sniveling! It won't save you now!
Your tears are useless here. They won't wash away what's on your hands.
I don't care if you're scared. I care about the truth!

maskAnswers.playerLine: People argue! It doesn't mean I killed anyone! This is ridiculous!

lowTension.text: All that noise won't change anything. You're just wasting oxygen that you're going to need later.
A loud mouth. A closed mind. A locked cell.
Anger is just a mask for fear. I'm looking forward to seeing what's hiding underneath.

highTension.text: Keep screaming and I'll make sure only four walls and a steel door will hear you from now on!
Finally, real passion. Everything comes out when people lose control.
You were so focused on yelling you forgot to keep the pieces together.

maskAnswers.playerLine: You know how it is, Detective. Two passionate people, strong opinions. We always made up afterward. It was just our dynamic.

lowTension.text: That almost sounded real. For your sake, keep it that way.
Finally, a lead that isn't a dead end. Don't get comfortable.

highTension.text: Stop this dance! You're finally talking sense.
Better hope it's true, you might just save your skin!
Don't get comfortable, masks aren't permanent.
